comments.title: Better than expected
comments.desc: I had been looking at a number of laptops to replace my old 2nd one and this stood out. It has 8gb RAM and 128GB eMMC with the possibility of upgrading to 1TB M.2 SSD, looking at this I believe it is the 2242 size SSD as the come in different dimensions. The set up was simple enough and it was up and running in
